title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 573 - Jurisdiction of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 573 - Jurisdiction of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act

State Regulations
§ 573.1 - General rule
§ 573.2 - Projects involving more than one land use area
§ 573.3 - Projects located in critical environmental areas
§ 573.4 - Subdivisions
§ 573.5 - Increase or expansion of certain land uses or developments
§ 573.6 - Rebuilding and replacement of existing land uses or developments
§ 573.7 - Jurisdiction and review of clearcutting
§ 573.8 - Accessory uses to residential structures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 573

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§15-2709, 24-0805, 24-0903; Executive Law, §§804, 809; art. 27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
